name: redux-routines
description: Simple, yet effective tool for removing Redux boilerplate code.
author: Jan Svager <jan@svager.cz> (https://github.com/svagi)

scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm test && npm run build
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -f -A lib
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish && npm run clean
